JST Compatible Assembly

JST Terminal Wire Assembly

Custom JST-compatible terminal wire assemblies manufactured to your specifications. Support for PH, XH, SH, GH, VH, and EH series connectors with pitch range 1.0mm to 3.96mm. UL-certified wire, 100% electrical testing, and ISO-compliant quality control.

Technical Specifications

Series Comparison

Series Pitch Current Voltage Wire Gauge Temp Range Applications
PH 2.0mm 2A 100V AC/DC AWG 28-24 -25¬∞C to +85¬∞C Consumer electronics, LED lighting, sensors
XH 2.5mm 3A 100V AC/DC AWG 26-22 -25¬∞C to +85¬∞C Power delivery, battery connections, industrial control
SH 1.0mm 1A 100V AC/DC AWG 32-28 -25¬∞C to +85¬∞C Wearable devices, compact electronics, IoT sensors
GH 1.25mm 1.5A 100V AC/DC AWG 32-28 -25¬∞C to +85¬∞C Medical devices, portable equipment, drones
VH 3.96mm 7A 250V AC/DC AWG 22-16 -25¬∞C to +85¬∞C Power supplies, industrial equipment, automotive
EH 2.5mm 3A 100V AC/DC AWG 26-22 -25¬∞C to +85¬∞C Board-to-board connections, LED drivers, controllers

Wire Specifications

Available Wire Types

All wire options are UL-certified and selected based on current rating, temperature requirements, and application environment.

Wire Type AWG Range Temp Rating Voltage Rating Description
UL1007 AWG 28-20 80¬∞C 300V Standard internal wiring
UL1015 AWG 26-16 105¬∞C 600V High-temperature applications
UL1061 AWG 30-22 80¬∞C 300V Compact electronic connections
Silicone AWG 26-14 150¬∞C 600V High-flex, medical/industrial
Teflon AWG 28-20 200¬∞C 600V Extreme temperature environments
